meaningMnemonic: If you take a <radical>thread</radical> and wrap up a bunch of it, so much it becomes a <radical>hill</radical> of thread, you're going to have a lot of thread. You can wrap some of that thread around other thread to create a much thicker thread. This thread is a <kanji>rope</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Congratulations, now you have a perfect rope for <reading>tuna</reading> (つな) fishing. Tunas are massive, so you need a strong rope to reel one in.
